name: Colony Clash
description:
Protect your colony ! Wisely build your enemy's path and use the cards in your deck to protect the queen.

Game's cover

Game's comic

This game was made in 48h at Pole3D by a team of 6 peoples :

Gaspard Derisquebourg : Design
Mattéo Benaissa : Programming
Julien Darras : Environement Art
Mahiedine Boudrissa : Character Art
Cyann Laget : Concept Art & game's cover
Dan Renaux  : Game's logo & comic
